title: My password isn't the same as it was yesterday
body: So yesterday I wanted to change the password on one of my accounts to make it more secure, and I put out a riot ticket about it because I forgot how to get into my email, but they still haven't responded, so I'm like, okay whatever I'm just gonna play some league. So I played league yesterday on that account and today, as I'm trying to log in, it says the "Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password click here". So I try to get on my account using the website, because I have my passwords saved onto this computer, so if I put in my username, it'll automatically enter the correct password (this was working yesterday, too). I try it, and it says the same thing as it said on the client. So now I've lost my account and I don't know how or why it's like this.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm it doesn't look like there are any signs of hackers or anything like that, but I'd be wary of using a program that automatically inputs your password for you. That sounds like it runs a pretty high risk of being malware, and it's best to stay safe. I think you might have been in a live chat with one of our tech guys earlier (heard a similar conversation over there) so hopefully, this was figured out already!

If not, hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help you get that reset.
No one has responded to any of my tickets yet and my account is still locked. What should I do now?
Sometimes it can take a bit for the agents to work through the queue depending on how many tickets are coming in of course. If you want, shoot me that ticket number and I'll check up on it for you!
How do I see the ticket number?
If you're able to check the email response you got about the ticket it should be listed in there, otherwise I could find the ticket with the Summoner Name of the account you sent the ticket under.
Could you check for me? The Summoner Name is 788irtegb54hi

That account doesn't seem to have any current or recent tickets, could you go ahead and try submitting another for those agents through here? -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
I'm sending tickets but when I go to My Tickets no tickets show up
Ayyyy it looks like that ticket finally worked and the agent was able to respond. If you haven't seen it yet, be sure to check your tickets or your email for their reply!
I wasn't in that live chat, and I sent out a ticket earlier, so I guess I'll just wait for someone to respond there.

If you made a ticket saying you wanted to change your password but don't know how to access your email, it's possible that they temporarily locked the account for security measures. I would suggest submitting a ticket for this issue if you haven't done so already, and trying to remember your information for your email would also be useful.
Okay, I'll try submitting a ticket, thanks!
I sent out a ticket, but I don't think I've been replied to yet
